class_notes: This section is for BSN traditional semester 3 students only. Registration will be processed by the Office of Education.
course_description: This course fosters critical thinking and clinical reasoning skills in nursing practice by building on nursing science and related basic science knowledge. Using cases/scenarios, students will integrate and synthesize content previous learned for patient- and family-centered care.
sections: Class Nbr: 3838, Section #: 100, Type: SEM, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Bass/Mueller, Status: Open
